thread.title: Twitterverse brutally mocks Republican Obamacare replacement in merciless memes
thread.title_full: Twitterverse brutally mocks Republican Obamacare replacement in merciless memes

author: Dan Tracer
title: Twitterverse brutally mocks Republican Obamacare replacement in merciless memes
text:
As previously noted , key elements of the GOP’s long-awaited Obamacare replacement plan have dribbled out this week, and it’s the utter mess you expected. 
Lowlights of the American Health Care Act include likely knocking millions of people off their coverage, discouraging healthy people from being insured, blocking federal funds for Planned Parenthood, and allowing insurers to hike prices for older Americans up to five times more than younger folks. 
Yikes. 
Twitter was quick to draw comparisons between the proposed bill and the system it is designed to replace — Obamacare. 
And just like that, Obamacare Vs. Trumpcare was born: Obamacare vs. GOP replacement pic.twitter.com/Pi7oRc6lgl 
— Dana Schwartz (@DanaSchwartzzz) March 7, 2017 
Obamacare vs. Trumpcare (via @jasoninthehouse ) pic.twitter.com/NG1MNyyOEM
